snippet.title: Kristala Gameplay Trailer - March 2023 Update
snippet.description:
Update to combat portions of the gameplay trailer for Dark Fantasy ARPG Kristala. This revised version of the trailer features updated gameplay footage from our Unreal Engine 5 build, recorded in March 2023. 

Kristala is a 3D Dark Fantasy ARPG developed using Unreal Engine by women-owned indie games studio, Astral Clocktower Studios.

#darkfantasy #indiegames #madewithunreal #unrealengine5 #arpg #actionrpg #soulslike #soulslikegames
